sentences.english: After months of preparation and practice, the archer finally hit the target dead center with her final arrow.
sentences.portuguese: Após meses de preparação e prática, a arqueira finalmente acertou o alvo bem no centro com sua flecha final.

sentences.english: The marketing campaign was a resounding success, as it hit the target audience precisely with its compelling message.
sentences.portuguese: A campanha de marketing foi um sucesso retumbante, pois atingiu precisamente o público-alvo com sua mensagem persuasiva.

elements.subtitle: To meet the deadline
elements.comments: To complete tasks on or before the specified time

sentences.english: Despite setbacks, the team worked tirelessly to meet the deadline for project delivery.
sentences.portuguese: Apesar dos contratempos, a equipe trabalhou incansavelmente para cumprir o prazo de entrega do projeto.

sentences.english: The contractor assured the client that they would meet the deadline for construction completion.
sentences.portuguese: O empreiteiro assegurou ao cliente que cumpriria o prazo para a conclusão da construção.

elements.subtitle: To stay on budget
elements.comments: To adhere to the allocated financial resources

sentences.english: The event organizers managed to stay on budget despite unexpected costs.
sentences.portuguese: Os organizadores do evento conseguiram permanecer dentro do orçamento, apesar dos custos inesperados.

sentences.english: The company implemented cost-saving measures to ensure they would stay on budget for the fiscal.
sentences.portuguese: A empresa implementou medidas de economia para garantir que permanecessem dentro do orçamento para o ano fiscal.

elements.subtitle: To exceed expectations
elements.comments: To surpass what is anticipated or required

sentences.english: The new product launch exceeded expectations, resulting in record-breaking sales.
sentences.portuguese: O lançamento do novo produto superou as expectativas, resultando em vendas que quebraram recordes.

sentences.english: The team's performance in the project review exceeded all expectations set by the management.
sentences.portuguese: O desempenho da equipe na revisão do projeto superou todas as expectativas estabelecidas pela gerência.

elements.subtitle: To drive results
elements.comments: To take actions that lead to successful outcomes

sentences.english: The CEO's leadership style was focused on driving results through effective decision-making.
sentences.portuguese: O estilo de liderança do CEO estava focado em impulsionar resultados por meio de tomadas de decisão eficazes.

sentences.english: The marketing team's innovative campaign strategies drove exceptional results in customer engagement.
sentences.portuguese: As estratégias de campanha inovadoras da equipe de marketing impulsionaram resultados excepcionais no engajamento do cliente.

elements.subtitle: To maintain quality standards
elements.comments: To uphold established levels of quality in products or services

sentences.english: The company prides itself on maintaining high quality standards across all its products.
sentences.portuguese: A empresa se orgulha de manter altos padrões de qualidade em todos os seus produtos.

sentences.english: The restaurant consistently maintains its quality standards to ensure customer satisfaction.
sentences.portuguese: O restaurante mantém consistentemente seus padrões de qualidade para garantir a satisfação do cliente.

elements.subtitle: To increase market share
elements.comments: To grow the portion of market sales relative to competitors

sentences.english: The company implemented aggressive marketing strategies to increase market share in the competitive industry.
sentences.portuguese: A empresa implementou estratégias de marketing agressivas para aumentar a participação de mercado na indústria competitiva.

sentences.english: The new product launch successfully increased the company's market share in the region.
sentences.portuguese: O lançamento do novo produto aumentou com sucesso a participação de mercado da empresa na região.

sentences.english: The company encouraged its employees to think outside the box to come up with innovative solutions.
sentences.portuguese: A empresa incentivou seus funcionários a pensar fora da caixa para encontrar soluções inovadoras.

sentences.english: To succeed in this competitive market, we need to think outside the box and explore new strategies.
sentences.portuguese: Para ter sucesso neste mercado competitivo, precisamos pensar fora da caixa e explorar novas estratégias.

sentences.english: The contractor gave us a ballpark figure for the renovation costs, but we need a detailed breakdown.
sentences.portuguese: O empreiteiro nos deu uma estimativa aproximada dos custos de renovação, mas precisamos de um detalhamento completo.

sentences.english: Can you give me a ballpark figure of how much the project will cost?
sentences.portuguese: Você pode me dar uma estimativa aproximada de quanto custará o projeto?

sentences.english: The company prides itself on developing cutting-edge technology that sets it apart from competitors.
sentences.portuguese: A empresa se orgulha de desenvolver tecnologia de ponta que a diferencia dos concorrentes.

sentences.english: Their research team is known for its cutting-edge discoveries in medical science.
sentences.portuguese: Sua equipe de pesquisa é conhecida por suas descobertas inovadoras na ciência médica.

elements.subtitle: To focus on the bottom line
elements.comments: To focus on the final result or key outcome

sentences.english: When making decisions, we always need to focus on the bottom line and consider profitability.
sentences.portuguese: Ao tomar decisões, sempre precisamos focar no resultado final e considerar a lucratividade.

sentences.english: The bottom line is that we need to reduce costs if we want to remain competitive.
sentences.portuguese: O ponto principal é que precisamos reduzir custos se quisermos permanecer competitivos.

sentences.english: Let's schedule a meeting to get the ball rolling on this new project.
sentences.portuguese: Vamos agendar uma reunião para iniciar este novo projeto.

sentences.english: She proposed a few ideas to get the ball rolling on the fundraising campaign.
sentences.portuguese: Ela propôs algumas ideias para começar a campanha de captação de recursos.

elements.subtitle: To be on the same page
elements.comments: To be in agreement or understanding the same information

sentences.english: Before moving forward, let's make sure everyone is on the same page regarding the project timeline.
sentences.portuguese: Antes de avançarmos, vamos garantir que todos estejam alinhados com o cronograma do projeto.

sentences.english: It's important that our team and the client are on the same page regarding project expectations.
sentences.portuguese: É importante que nossa equipe e o cliente estejam alinhados com as expectativas do projeto.

elements.subtitle: To take the plunge
elements.comments: To make a risky or significant decision

sentences.english: After careful consideration, she decided to take the plunge and start her own business.
sentences.portuguese: Depois de considerar cuidadosamente, ela decidiu dar o mergulho e abrir seu próprio negócio.

sentences.english: Taking the plunge into international markets requires thorough market research and strategic planning.
sentences.portuguese: Dar o mergulho nos mercados internacionais requer pesquisa de mercado detalhada e planejamento estratégico.

elements.subtitle: To do something under the table
elements.comments: To do something secretly or illegally, especially concerning payments or agreements

sentences.english: They were accused of making payments under the table to avoid taxes.
sentences.portuguese: Eles foram acusados de fazer pagamentos por baixo dos panos para evitar impostos.

sentences.english: He offered to pay me under the table for the extra work I did, but I refused.
sentences.portuguese: Ele ofereceu pagar por fora pelo trabalho extra que fiz, mas eu recusei.

elements.subtitle: To engage in blue-sky thinking
elements.comments: To brainstorm without limits, often focusing on creative and ambitious ideas

sentences.english: We need some blue-sky thinking to come up with new product concepts for the next quarter.
sentences.portuguese: Precisamos de um pensamento criativo para desenvolver novos conceitos de produtos para o próximo trimestre.

sentences.english: Their team session was all about blue-sky thinking to solve the company's long-term challenges.
sentences.portuguese: A sessão da equipe deles foi toda focada em um pensamento criativo para resolver os desafios de longo prazo da empresa.

elements.subtitle: To touch base
elements.comments: To make contact or reconnect briefly, typically regarding progress or updates

sentences.english: Let's touch base next week to discuss the project status.
sentences.portuguese: Vamos nos falar na semana que vem para discutir o status do projeto.

sentences.english: I just wanted to touch base with you to see how things are progressing.
sentences.portuguese: Eu só queria falar rapidamente com você para ver como as coisas estão progredindo.
